Once you have created your Teaching Group and given it a Group Code, your students are ready to login and assign themselves to the Teaching Group.

These are the steps that the students will follow:

  1. Once logged into Kerboodle Secondary, click on the Join a Teaching Group button
  2. Enter the Group Code you have been given by your Teacher
  3. Click on the Add to Group button.
